name: Target Practice (itch) (Klaere)
description:
In Target Practice you have to achieve the highest score possible by destroying as many targets as you can, some will move faster than others so aim well! You utilize shurikens  that will go through multiple targets, but you only have ten so make them count. Press the {SpaceBar} to shoot.

This game was made possible due to the super generous help of Martin Bremer, so yeah shout outs to my boy for giving me some well needed code Assistance.

Made by Ian Klaere

Instagram: ianklaere99

Made for the Game Design // UE class of the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai
